snippet: The debate over gay marriage continued after Vice President Joseph R. Biden Jr.'s comments on the issue, reports Peter Baker. The fallout could affect donors to Obama's re-election campaign, reports Nicholas Confessore. And Jeremy W. Peters takes...
abstract: The debate over gay marriage continued after Vice President Joseph R. Biden Jr.'s comments on the issue, reports Peter Baker. The fallout could affect donors to Obama's re-election campaign, reports Nicholas Confessore. And Jeremy W. Peters takes readers behind the scenes with Obama's ad man, Jim Margolis.

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: Same-Sex Marriage, Civil Unions and Domestic Partnerships
